pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Criteria Decision Making Methods // An R implementation of Four Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) Methods: Technique for Order of Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (TOPSIS), "VIseKriterijumska Optimizacija I Kompromisno Resenje" (VIKOR), both Multi-Objective Optimization by Ratio Analysis and Full Multiplicative Form (Multi-MOORA) and Weighted Aggregated Sum Product ASsessment (WASPAS). In addition, this package provides a MetaRanking function which combines the output of the previous methods.
